articles.author: Coingape Staff
articles.title: Bitcoin Whales Pull Out Over 21400 BTC From Exchanges In A Week - CoinGape
articles.description: Bitcoin whales pulled out more than 21,400 BTC from crypto exchanges this week to realize the profits of the recent price rally.
articles.content:
Story Highlights
  • Bitcoin whales initiated massive withdrawals this week.
  • More than 21,000 BTC were withdrawn from crypto exchanges.
  • The withdrawal accelerated the recent Bitc… [+2484 chars]

articles.title: Market Shakeup — BSV Faces Steep Decline After UK Judge's Decision in COPA Case – Markets and Prices Bitcoin News - Bitcoin.com News
articles.description: Analysis from March 8 to March 15, 2024, indicates the token BSV dropped 18.9% in value against the U.S. dollar.
